vote.title: Authorize (1) an extension through September 30, 2023 for Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) Funds in the amount of $1,775,635 in CDBG funded projects that have not met the City’s twelve-month obligation or twenty-four-month expenditure requirement; (2) preliminary adoption of Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2022-23 Action Plan to: (a) use unspent prior year CDBG Funds in the amount of $2,971,130 for the Residential Development Acquisition Loan Program; (b) use unspent CDBG CARES Act Relief (CDBG-COVID) Funds in the amount of $403,405 for the Eviction Assistance Program; (c) use unspent Housing Opportunities for Persons with Aids (HOPWA) CARES Act Relief Funds in the amount of $69,229 for the Emergency Assistance Program; and (d) amend Schedule B to the FY 2022-23 HUD Consolidated Plan Budget for CDBG to add an activity for Out-of-School Time Program-Community Sites and reallocate $97,441 from Out-of-School Time Program-School Sites to the new activity, and correct the department for Americans with Disability Act Improvements; and (3) a public hearing to be held on March 8, 2023 to receive comments on the proposed use of funds for Reprogramming Budget No. 1 (Substantial Amendment No. 1) to the FY 2022-23 Action Plan - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
